column4: I am receiving the "error: no such device" message when I try to boot into Win/Ubuntu.
likely a grub error?  are you using grub1 or grub2 (if you're not sure tell what version of ubuntu you are using, AND if it was upgraded or not)
do the change root stuff from CD and let GRUB2 try to automatically resetup
you need to read the link ubottu gave you.  best of luck man, ask if you have any questions after reading it.
